Custom Filters

Get a custom filter details

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

custom\_filters

/

{custom\_filter\_id}

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/custom_filters/{custom_filter_id} \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

401

404

Copy

```
{
  "id": 123,
  "name": "<string>",
  "type": "conversation",
  "query": {},
  "created_at": "2023-11-07T05:31:56Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-11-07T05:31:56Z"
}
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#parameter-custom-filter-id)

custom\_filter\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the custom filter

#### Response

200

200401404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#response-id)

id

number

The ID of the custom filter

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#response-name)

name

string

The name of the custom filter

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#response-type)

type

enum<string>

The description about the custom filter

Available options:

`conversation`,

`contact`,

`report`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#response-query)

query

object

A query that needs to be saved as a custom filter

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#response-created-at)

created\_at

string

The time at which the custom filter was created

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/custom-filters/get-a-custom-filter-details#response-updated-at)

updated\_at

string

The time at which the custom filter was updated
